name: Acid Reflux
description: Acid Reflux, also known as gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) when chronic, is a condition in which stomach acid frequently flows back into the esophagus, causing irritation and a burning sensation known as heartburn. It can lead to discomfort after eating, regurgitation of food or sour liquid, and difficulty swallowing. Lifestyle changes, dietary modifications, and natural remedies can help manage symptoms and prevent flare-ups.
symptoms: Regurgitation of food or sour liquid
causesAndRisks: Avoid lying down immediately after eating
preventionTips: Limit spicy, fatty, and acidic foods

name: Migraine
description: Migraine is a neurological condition characterized by intense, debilitating headaches, often accompanied by nausea, vomiting, and sensitivity to light or sound. Migraines can last for hours or days and may be triggered by stress, certain foods, hormonal changes, or environmental factors.
causesAndRisks: Certain foods and drinks (e.g., aged cheese, alcohol)

name: Hormonal Imbalance
description: An imbalance in hormones affecting various functions in women.

name: Low Testosterone
description: A condition where the body produces less testosterone than normal.

name: Erectile Dysfunction
description: Difficulty in achieving or maintaining an erection.

name: Prostate Health
description: Issues related to the prostate gland in men.

name: Hair Loss (Male)
description: Hair thinning or balding typically seen in men.

name: Low Libido
description: Reduced sexual desire in men.

name: Premature Ejaculation
description: Ejaculation that occurs sooner than desired during sex.

name: Infertility
description: Inability to conceive after 12 months of regular unprotected intercourse.

name: Muscle Weakness
description: Reduced strength in one or more muscles.

name: Fatigue (Men)
description: Persistent tiredness in men despite rest.

name: Gynecomastia
description: Enlargement of breast tissue in males.

name: Frequent Colds
description: Recurring viral infections of the upper respiratory tract.

name: Chronic Fatigue
description: Long-term fatigue not improved by rest.

name: Low Immunity
description: A weakened immune system that makes one susceptible to infections.

name: Autoimmune Conditions
description: Diseases where the immune system attacks the body’s own cells.

name: Allergies
description: Overreaction of the immune system to harmless substances.

name: Swollen Lymph Nodes
description: Swelling of lymph nodes usually due to infection.

name: Cold Sores
description: Blisters around lips caused by herpes simplex virus.

name: Fevers
description: Elevated body temperature as a response to infection or illness.

name: Post-Viral Fatigue
description: Fatigue and weakness that lingers after recovery from a viral infection.

name: Immune Support
description: General support for maintaining a healthy immune system.

name: Arthritis
description: Inflammation of joints causing pain and stiffness.

name: Back Pain
description: Discomfort or pain in the back area due to various causes.

name: Joint Pain
description: Discomfort or inflammation in one or more joints.

name: Muscle Soreness
description: Pain or tenderness in muscles, typically after exercise or strain.

name: Tendonitis
description: Inflammation of a tendon causing pain and limited movement.

name: Neck Pain
description: Discomfort in the neck area due to strain or injury.

name: Fibromyalgia
description: A chronic condition causing widespread pain and fatigue.

name: Cramps
description: Sudden, involuntary muscle contractions causing pain.

name: Stiffness
description: Reduced flexibility or discomfort when moving joints or muscles.

name: Sciatica
description: Pain that radiates along the sciatic nerve from lower back down the leg.

name: Insomnia
description: Difficulty falling or staying asleep.

name: Sleep Apnea
description: Interrupted breathing during sleep, often with snoring.

name: Daytime Fatigue
description: Feeling excessively tired during the day despite adequate sleep.

name: Low Energy
description: Persistent lack of vitality and motivation.

name: Restless Legs
description: Uncomfortable urge to move legs, especially at night.

name: Night Sweats
description: Excessive sweating during sleep, unrelated to temperature.

name: Jet Lag
description: Temporary sleep disturbance from crossing time zones.

name: Oversleeping
description: Sleeping excessively and feeling groggy afterwards.

name: Grogginess
description: Mental fuzziness or drowsiness after waking up.

name: Poor Sleep Quality
description: Sleep that is unrefreshing or easily disrupted.

name: Hair Loss
description: Loss of hair from the scalp or body.

name: Dandruff
description: Flaking of skin on the scalp.

name: Dry Scalp
description: Lack of moisture in the scalp causing flaking and itchiness.

name: Oily Scalp
description: Excess oil production on the scalp.

name: Itchy Scalp
description: Persistent itching of the scalp.

name: Thinning Hair
description: Gradual loss of hair volume or density.

name: Brittle Hair
description: Hair that is dry, fragile, and prone to breakage.

name: Premature Graying
description: Early appearance of gray or white hair before the typical aging process.

name: Scalp Psoriasis
description: Chronic skin condition causing red, scaly patches on the scalp.

name: Alopecia
description: Sudden or gradual hair loss on the scalp or other parts of the body.

name: Pollen Allergy
description: Allergic reaction to pollen from trees, grass, or weeds.
preventionTips: Stay indoors during high pollen times

name: Food Sensitivity
description: Difficulty digesting certain foods, leading to discomfort.

name: Pet Allergy
description: Allergic reaction to proteins in pet dander, saliva, or urine.

name: Mold Allergy
description: Allergic reaction to mold spores in indoor or outdoor environments.
causesAndRisks: Exposure to damp or moldy areas

name: Dust Allergy
description: Allergic reaction to dust mites found in house dust.

name: Lactose Intolerance
description: Inability to digest lactose, a sugar found in dairy products.

name: Gluten Sensitivity
description: Adverse reaction to gluten without having celiac disease.

name: Seasonal Allergies
description: Allergic reactions that occur during specific seasons due to pollen.
causesAndRisks: Pollen from trees, grass, and weeds
preventionTips: Stay indoors during peak pollen times

name: Hives
description: Itchy, raised welts on the skin due to an allergic reaction.

name: Chemical Sensitivities
description: Adverse reactions to low-level chemical exposures.

name: UTI
description: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI) is a bacterial infection that affects the urinary system.

name: Kidney Stones
description: Hard deposits made of minerals and salts that form inside the kidneys.

name: Frequent Urination
description: Needing to urinate more often than usual.

name: Bladder Infections
description: Infection in the bladder, typically caused by bacteria.

name: Incontinence
description: Loss of bladder control resulting in accidental leakage of urine.

name: Painful Urination
description: Discomfort or burning sensation while urinating.

name: Nocturia
description: Excessive urination at night.

name: Interstitial Cystitis
description: Chronic condition causing bladder pressure and pain.

name: Urinary Retention
description: Inability to fully empty the bladder.

name: Protein in Urine
description: Presence of excess protein in the urine, often indicating kidney issues.

name: Thyroid Imbalance
description: General disruption of thyroid hormone levels in the body.

name: Hypothyroidism
description: Condition where the thyroid gland doesn't produce enough hormones.

name: Hyperthyroidism
description: Condition where the thyroid gland produces too much hormone.

name: Adrenal Fatigue
description: A condition believed to occur when the adrenal glands function below necessary levels.

name: Hormonal Acne
description: Acne caused by hormone fluctuations, often seen in adults.

name: Blood Sugar Imbalance
description: Fluctuations in blood glucose levels outside the normal range.

name: Diabetes Type 2
description: A chronic condition that affects how the body processes blood sugar.

name: Cortisol Imbalance
description: Disruption in the levels of the stress hormone cortisol.

name: Estrogen Dominance
description: A condition where estrogen levels outweigh progesterone levels in the body.

name: Testosterone Imbalance
description: Abnormal levels of testosterone leading to various symptoms in men and women.

name: Toothache
description: Pain in or around a tooth, often due to decay or infection.

name: Gum Disease
description: Infection of the gums that can lead to tooth loss if untreated.

name: Bad Breath
description: Persistent unpleasant odor from the mouth.

name: Cavities
description: Permanently damaged areas in teeth that develop into holes.

name: Tooth Sensitivity
description: Pain or discomfort in teeth from hot, cold, or sweet stimuli.

name: Mouth Ulcers
description: Small, painful lesions in the mouth.

name: Dry Mouth
description: Lack of adequate saliva in the mouth.

name: Bleeding Gums
description: Bleeding of the gums during brushing or flossing.

name: Receding Gums
description: The gums pull away from the tooth surface, exposing roots.

name: Plaque Buildup
description: Accumulation of bacteria and food debris on the teeth leading to tartar and cavities.

name: Liver Support
description: General support for healthy liver function and detoxification.

name: Fatty Liver
description: Condition where excess fat builds up in the liver, impairing function.

name: Bile Flow Issues
description: Disruption in the flow of bile can affect digestion and liver function.

name: Liver Inflammation
description: Swelling and irritation of liver tissue often due to infections or toxins.

name: Gallstones
description: Solid particles that form in the gallbladder and may block bile flow.

name: Jaundice
description: Yellowing of the skin and eyes due to excess bilirubin in the blood.

name: Dry Eyes
description: Insufficient tear production or poor tear quality causing irritation.

name: Eye Strain
description: Fatigue and discomfort from prolonged visual tasks.

name: Blurred Vision
description: Loss of sharpness in eyesight leading to unclear images.

name: Glaucoma
description: A group of eye conditions that damage the optic nerve, often from high pressure.

name: Macular Degeneration
description: A disease that causes loss of central vision due to retina damage.

name: Night Blindness
description: Reduced vision in low light or darkness.
preventionTips: Eat foods rich in vitamin A

name: Red Eyes
description: Red or bloodshot appearance in one or both eyes.

name: Watery Eyes
description: Excessive tearing not caused by emotion.

name: Twitching Eyelid
description: Involuntary, repetitive spasm of eyelid muscles.

name: Floaters
description: Tiny spots or threads that appear to float across your vision.

name: Ear Infections
description: Inflammation of the inner, middle, or outer ear due to infection.

name: Tinnitus
description: Perception of ringing or noise in the ears without external sound.

name: Sore Throat
description: Pain or irritation in the throat, often caused by infection or irritation.

name: Nasal Congestion
description: Blockage of nasal passages due to inflammation or mucus buildup.

name: Post-Nasal Drip
description: Mucus dripping down the back of the throat from the nasal passages.

name: Hoarseness
description: Abnormal change in the voice, usually from vocal strain or irritation.

name: Tonsillitis
description: Inflammation of the tonsils, often due to infection.
preventionTips: Avoid close contact with sick people

name: Snoring
description: Loud breathing sound during sleep caused by airway obstruction.

name: Dry Throat
description: Lack of moisture in the throat causing irritation or discomfort.

name: Loss of Smell
description: Reduced or complete loss of the sense of smell.

name: Migraines
description: Intense, throbbing headaches often with nausea and sensitivity to light.

name: Headaches
description: Pain or discomfort in the head or upper neck.

name: Nerve Pain
description: Burning, tingling, or shooting pain from nerve damage or compression.

name: Neuropathy
description: Damage to peripheral nerves causing weakness, numbness, and pain.

name: Tremors
description: Involuntary, rhythmic shaking of body parts, especially hands.

name: Vertigo
description: A sensation of spinning or dizziness, often due to inner ear issues.

name: Memory Loss
description: Impaired ability to remember information, events, or skills.

name: Concentration Issues
description: Difficulty focusing or staying attentive during tasks.

name: Seizures
description: Sudden, uncontrolled electrical disturbance in the brain.

name: Parkinson’s Support
description: Support for managing Parkinson's disease symptoms and progression.

name: Weight Loss
description: The process of reducing body fat through lifestyle changes.

name: Immune Boost
description: Improving immune system strength and response.

name: Anti-Aging
description: Delaying or reversing visible signs of aging.

name: Hydration
description: Maintaining adequate body water levels.

name: Nutrient Deficiency
description: Lack of essential nutrients in the diet leading to health issues.

name: Metabolism Boost
description: Increasing the rate at which the body burns calories and fat.

name: Chronic Inflammation
description: Long-term inflammation in the body contributing to disease.

name: Stress Relief
description: Techniques and practices to reduce physical and mental stress.

name: Longevity
description: Improving lifespan and overall health through lifestyle choices.

name: Epilepsy
description: A neurological disorder marked by recurrent, unprovoked seizures.

name: Rosacea
description: A chronic skin condition that causes redness and visible blood vessels.

name: Bronchitis
description: Inflammation of the bronchial tubes in the lungs, often causing coughing and mucus.

name: Lupus
description: A chronic autoimmune disease where the immune system attacks healthy tissues.

name: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
description: A hormonal disorder causing enlarged ovaries with small cysts and irregular menstrual cycles.
